title: Black Widow
description: Natasha Romanoff confronts the darker parts of her ledger when a dangerous conspiracy with ties to her past arises. Pursued by a force that will stop at nothing to bring her down, Natasha must deal with her history as a spy, and the broken relationships left in her wake long before she became an Avenger.

title: Shang-Chi and the Legend of the Ten Rings
description: Shang-Chi must confront the past he thought he left behind when he is drawn into the web of the mysterious Ten Rings organization.

title: Eternals
description: The Eternals, a race of immortal beings with superhuman powers who have secretly lived on Earth for thousands of years, reunite to battle the evil Deviants.

title: Spider-Man: No Way Home
description: Peter Parker's world is turned upside down when his identity as Spider-Man is revealed, forcing him to seek help from Doctor Strange. However, when a spell goes wrong, villains from other dimensions start to appear, threatening everything he holds dear.

title: Doctor Strange in the Multiverse of Madness
description: Doctor Strange teams up with Scarlet Witch to confront dark forces from parallel dimensions.

title: Thor: Love and Thunder
description: Thor teams up with Jane Foster, who transforms into the mighty Thor, to battle an ancient enemy.

title: Black Panther: Wakanda Forever
description: The kingdom of Wakanda faces turmoil as they mourn the loss of their king and navigate threats from within and outside their borders.

title: The Marvels
description: Carol Danvers teams up with Kamala Khan and Monica Rambeau to face a new threat.

title: Ant-Man and the Wasp: Quantumania
description: Scott Lang, Hope van Dyne, and Hank Pym embark on a new adventure involving the Quantum Realm.

title: Guardians of the Galaxy Vol. 3
description: The Guardians of the Galaxy face new challenges as they explore the cosmos.

title: Loki
description: After the fall of Asgard, Loki faces new challenges and the fate of the universe lies in his palms. Along with a possible chance at redemption.

title: Fantastic Four
description: A team of scientists gains superpowers after being exposed to cosmic radiation and must use their newfound abilities to save the world.

title: Deadpool 3
description: Wade Wilson, aka Deadpool, embarks on a new adventure filled with action, humor, and pop culture references.

title: X-Men: The Mutants
description: The X-Men, a team of mutants with extraordinary abilities, fight to protect a world that fears and hates them.

title: Captain America & The Winter Soldier
description: A new hero takes up the mantle of Captain America and along with a friend faces new threats.

title: New Avengers
description: A new team of Avengers assembles to defend Earth against powerful threats.

title: Hulk
description: Bruce Banner grapples with his inner demons and the monstrous Hulk persona as he faces new challenges.

title: The Thunderbolts
description: A team of reformed villains forms to take on dangerous missions in exchange for leniency.

title: Agents of S.H.I.E.L.D.
description: The Strategic Homeland Intervention, Enforcement, and Logistics Division tackle global threats.

title: WandaVision
description: Wanda Maximoff and Vision live idealized suburban lives, but begin to suspect everything is not as it seems.

title: Black Panther
description: T'Challa, heir to the hidden but advanced kingdom of Wakanda, must step forward to lead his people into a new future and confront a challenger from his country's past.
